about_the_game:
Alright here we go, I'm gonna explain the entire game to you, top to bottom, so listen up!

Seaside Schemes is a game all about schemes, make a plan and execute it to achieve success. I would however be remised if I forgot to mention the side of sea this game harbours. Throughout the game you and your squad will be situated by the ocean, recruit the local fish to your team and fight the opposition using superior tactics!

There are many ways to gain an edge! First of all your team composition is incredibly vital, fish of the same type power each other up and gain stronger bonuses. Also keep in mind that not all fish are made equal, the more gold they cost to get on your team, the higher the quality of the fins! MOREOVER! Every other round you will not face your opponent but the hostile wildlife, these attackers prove vital to your offensive as they drop items when killed. Give these items to your fish and they will experience a qualitative leap in combat!

When your adversary has no more HP to give, you will be victorious!

The game is only Online, someone else needs to be there to play... which could be a problem.. nah surely not

Knowledge with Auto-battlers is heavily recommended as there is no tutorial and it can be a lot to grok if it's your first time through.

Art by Cordelia Svensson & Olle Ek

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

29 – Visual Cordelia
short_description: Seaside Schemes is an intense 1v1 competitive auto-battler! Inspired from Teamfight tactics and nothing else, I bring you Fishfight tactics, though I didn't name it that in fear of a lawsuit. Build your team, strategize, out-manoeuvre and out-play to climb the ladder and claim your spot as the goat!
